text: Apani ki taderake dekhenani yara dabi kare ye, apanara prati ya nayila hayeche ebam apanara purbe ya nayila hayeche tate tara imana eneche, athaca tara tagutera kache bicaraprarthi hate caya, yadi'o setake pratyakhyana karara jan'ya taderake nirdesa deya hayeche. Ara sayatana taderake bhisanabhabe pathabhrasta karate caya
